ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the business phone field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(Business_Phone__c) && NOT(ISNULL(Business_Phone__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Business_Phone__c)) && !REGEX(Business_Phone__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(Business_Phone__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Business_Phone__c)) && !REGEX(Business_Phone__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for business phone. The minimum number of digits should be 10
